description: Local name used to refer to the administrative unit 5 where the borehole is located.
Local name used to refer to the administrative unit 4 where the borehole is located.
Local name used to refer to the administrative unit 3 where the borehole is located.
Unique identification number assigned to the borehole by the borehole maintenance company.
Most recent repair date of the borehole.
Number of people that collect water from the borehole.
Total depth of the borehole (measured in meters).
Depth of the stable water level within the borehole when pumping isn't happening (measured in meters).
Depth of the pump when installed from land surface (measured in meters).
Water production capacity of the borehole (measured in m3/h).
